00083 
00084 Ray* TSeparatorKit::Intersect( const Ray& ray, RandomDeviate& rand ) const
00085 {
00086         Trace trace( "TSeparatorKit::Intersect", false );
00087         
00088         //Test if the ray intersects with this bounding box
00089         SbBox3f box= m_boundigBox.project();
00090         
00091         double t0 = ray.mint;
00092         double t1 = ray.maxt;
00093 
00094     for( int i = 0; i < 3; ++i )
00095     {
00096         double invRayDir = 1.0 / ray.direction[i];
00097         double tNear = ( box.getMin()[i] - ray.origin[i] ) * invRayDir;
00098         double tFar = ( box.getMax()[i] - ray.origin[i] ) * invRayDir;
00099         if( tNear > tFar ) std::swap( tNear, tFar );
00100         t0 = tNear > t0 ? tNear : t0;
00101         t1 = tFar < t1 ? tFar : t1;
00102         if( t0 > t1 ) return 0;
00103     }
00104    
00105         Ray* result = 0;
00106          
00107         //The ray intersects with the BoundingBox
00108         //Transform the ray to call children intersect
00109         SoTransform* coinTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* > ( transform.getValue() );
00110         if ( coinTransform )
00111         {
00112                 Transform objectToWorld( *coinTransform );
00113                 Transform worldToObject = objectToWorld.GetInverse();
00114                 
00115                 Ray objectRay( worldToObject( ray ) );                                   
00116                 objectRay.maxt = ray.maxt;
00117                 
00118                 Ray* reflected = 0;
00119                 Ray* childReflected = 0;
00120                 
00121                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = dynamic_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( childList.getValue() );
00122                 
00123                 if( coinPartList )
00124                 { 
00125                         for( int index = 0; index < coinPartList->getNumChildren(); index++ )
00126                         {
00127                                 SoBaseKit* coinChild = dynamic_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinPartList->getChild( index ) );
00128                                 if( coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00129                                 {
00130                                         TSeparatorKit* child = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( coinChild );
00131                                         childReflected = child->Intersect( objectRay, rand );
00132                                 }
00133                                 else if(coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) 
00134                                 {
00135                                         TShapeKit* child = dynamic_cast< TShapeKit* >( coinChild );
00136                                         childReflected = child->Intersect( objectRay, rand );
00137                                         
00138                                 }
00139                                 
00140                                 if( ray.maxt != objectRay.maxt )
00141                                 {
00142                                         delete reflected;
00143                                         reflected = 0;                  
00144                                     ray.maxt = objectRay.maxt;
00145                                 }
00146                                 
00147                                 if( childReflected ) 
00148                                 {
00149                                     reflected = new Ray( *childReflected );
00150                                     delete childReflected;
00151                                     childReflected = 0;
00152                                 }
00153                         }
00154                         
00155                         if( reflected ) 
00156                         {       
00157                                 result = new Ray( objectToWorld( *reflected ) );        
00158                                 delete reflected;
00159                                 reflected = 0;
00160                         }
00161                 }       
00162         }               
00163         return result;  
00164 }
